alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 10:40PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Benewah, southwestern Kootenai and southeastern Spokane Counties through 1015 PM PDT... At 940 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Plummer, or 19 miles south of Spokane Valley, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairfield, Rockford, Spangle, Worley, Waverly, Valleyford, and Mica. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 399 and 414. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 80 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
